Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45288 affecting package helm for versions less than 3.14.2-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-45288 affecting package helm for versions less than 3.14.2-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package helm is earlier than 3.14.2-2, affected by CVE-2023-45288
